newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Meredith FY97 view raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Meredith FY97 view raised.

text.p: --Gruntal & Co Inc said Tuesday it increased its FY97 EPS projection on Meredith Corp to $2.17 from $2.14 as the result of the company's better-than-expected Q1 earnings.
--Meredith late on Monday reported Q1 EPS of $0.45, up from $0.31 in the same year-ago period. The year-earlier results included a $0.03 per share charge from discontinued operations.
--Analyst Rita Zanella Benson in a report also reiterated her recommend purchase rating on the stock with a price target of $55.
